mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MAM_MEASOBJ (ID, tunnel_id,store_id,area_id,SECTION_ID, NAME, DATATYPE_ID, OBJTYPE_ID, ACTIVED, DESCRIPTION, REFRESH_TIME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, height, deviation) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objtypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actived,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviation,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update T_MAM_MEASOBJ
tunnel_id = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATATYPE_ID = #{datatypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJTYPE_ID = #{objtypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVED = #{actived,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviation = #{deviation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE T_MAM_MEASOBJ SET tunnel_id = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATATYPE_ID = #{datatypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJTYPE_ID = #{objtypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTIVED = #{actived,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviation = #{deviation,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select id from T_MAM_MEASOBJ where tunnel_id = #{id}
select * from T_MAM_MEASOBJ where section_id = #{sectionId} and datatype_id = #{datatypeId}
